comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
nudecowboy:

Thanks for shedding a bit more light on Mr. Medzikhovsky. Since the photo appears to be dated Dec. 24, 1913, and the article you've linked dates from Dec. 17, 1913, the information is quite timely! We will add to the record when we update.
